      • createQuerier

        protected com.yahoo.bullet.querying.Querier createQuerier(com.yahoo.bullet.querying.Querier.Mode mode,
                                                          String id,
                                                          com.yahoo.bullet.query.Query query,
                                                          com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.Metadata metadata,
                                                          com.yahoo.bullet.common.BulletConfig config)
        Exposed for testing only. Create a Querier from the given query ID, body and configuration.
        Parameters:
        mode - The Querier.Mode to use to create the instance.
        id - The ID for the query.
        query - The actual query object.
        metadata - The metadata that came with the query object.
        config - The configuration to use for the query.
        Returns:
        A created, uninitialized instance of a querier or a RuntimeException if there were issues.

      • removeQuery

        protected void removeQuery(String id)
        Remove the query with this given id. Override this if you need to do additional cleanup.
        Parameters:
        id - The String id of the query.
